}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[Atheros]] '''UB94''' reference design ([[Atheros AR7010]] / AR9280)
*Product MPN: B0032OUVN2, USB ID: 0930:0a08 *Standards: 802.11a, 802.11b, 802.11g, 802.11n *Security: WEP64/128, TKIP, AES, WPA/WPA2-PSK, WPS *USB 2.0, compatible w/ TL838/TL868G/RL838G/RL953RB
This device is available under different marketing names: *WLM-20U2 - Wireless USB Dongle for Toshiba TVs *GN-1080 - Wireless LAN Module for Toshiba MFPs
===TV Dongles: Toshiba, Sony, Panasonic=== *[[TP-LINK TL-WN821N v3]] - USB 2.0 (0cf3:7015) :FCC ID: TE7WN821NV3, [[Atheros]] AR7010/AR9287
*Flash EEPROM 24с16 (PonyProg2000) :VID&PID: 10с...10f (hex), MAC: 20с...213 (hex) :*[[Toshiba WLM-20U2]]: 30 09 08 0a (0930:0a08) :*[[Sony UWA-BR100]]: 11 04 7f 01 (0411:017f) :*[[Panasonic N5HBZ0000055]]: da 04 04 39 (04da:3904) :*[[Microsoft Xbox 360 Wireless N Networking Adapter|Microsoft Xbox 360]]: 5e 04 a8 02 (045e:02a8)
==Links of Interest== [https://www.wireless-driver.com/toshiba-wlm-20u2-wlan-adaptor-overview-datasheet/# Datasheet]
==See also== *[[Toshiba WLM-10U1]] - ''802.11n USB 2.0 WLAN Adapter'' :[[Askey WLU5022]] V86A00011500/WLM-10U1 (0930:0a07) :FCC ID: H8N-WLU5022; Chipset: [[Ralink]] RT3572 *[[Toshiba WLM-10U2]] - ASIN: B003PAMQYU • [http://www.toshiba.co.uk/discontinued-products/wlm-10u2/ PPage] *[[Toshiba WLM-10UB1]] - ''802.11n USB 2.0 WLAN Adapter'' :[[Arcadyan WN8522B]] WLM-10UB1/WN8522B (0a5c:bd13) :FCC ID: RAX-WN8522B65; Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM4323 *[[Toshiba WLM-12EB1]] - ''Wireless USB 2.0 Dongle'' • [http://www.toshiba.co.uk/discontinued-products/wlm-12eb1/ PPage] *[[Toshiba WLM-20U2]] - ''802.11n USB 2.0 WLAN Adapter'' • [http://www.toshiba.co.uk/discontinued-products/wlm-20u2/ PPage] :[[Askey WLU5080-D81]] (20U?), [[Askey WLU5080-D4]] (0930:0a08) :FCC ID: H8N-WLU5080, H8N-WLU5080-D4; AR7010/AR9280 :[[Panasonic N5HBZ0000055]] H8N-WLU5080 (04da:3904) *[[Toshiba WLM-30U2]] - ''Wireless USB 2.0 Dongle'' • [http://www.toshiba.co.uk/discontinued-products/wlm-30u2/ PPage] :Chipset: [[Ralink RT5572]], MPN: VEZZY200, USB 2.0 (148f:5572) :TV: 32W3451DB/40L3451DB/48L3451DB • B00HVD1QUW *[[Toshiba WLM-40U]] - ''802.11n USB 2.0 WLAN Adapter'' :Chipset: [[Realtek]] RTL8192DU, USB 2.0 (0930:0a12) :TV: ''Toshiba 39L3300'' • [http://www.minihere.com/toshiba-wlm-40u-driver.html WLM-40U Spec., Driver] *[[Askey WLU5053]] - ''802.11abgn USB Wireless Module'' :''Toshiba TV Wireless USB Dongle'', USB 2.0 (0930:0a0b) :FCC ID: H8N-WLU5053; Chipset: [[Broadcom]] BCM43236B *[[EDUP EP-MS8512]] - ''Toshiba [http://www.toshiba-multimedia.com/eu/store-external-hard-drives/tv-plus/ STOR.E TV+]'' :Chipset: [[Realtek]] RTL8191SU, USB 2.0
